result.arabic_text: قُل لِّمَن مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ قُل لِّلَّهِۚ كَتَبَ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَةَۚ لَيَجۡمَعَنَّكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
result.translation: 12.Nabiyow A-korosuk Qaranwaa kee baaxooy ken nammayih addal taniimih Reeda miyyileeh?keenik ixxic, woo Reeda dibuk Yalli- le keenik ixxic, Yalli isi nafsii Racmat mekleeh yuktubeh ikkal isi naqoosak digaalat mayasissika, diggah Yalli Qhiyaamah ayróy agaywaaga sinnit cisab kee galtoh sin gaaboyse-le, koroosite mari sinni nafsi kasaariseeh finqiseh, toysa usun Yallih inkittinaanee kee Nabii Mucammad Nubuwannul mayaaminan.
